name: Overwatch Style
text: You have learned to wait until your ranged attacks have the greatest effect.
prerequisites: Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon.
benefit: While using this style, as a full-round action you can ready two ranged attacks with the chosen weapon, each with its own triggering event. You take a â€“2 penalty on attack rolls made with these readied actions.
special: A character with this feat and the weapon training (bows, crossbows, or firearms) class feature can use Overwatch Style with any bow, crossbow, or firearm, respectively, in addition to the chosen weapon.
